Articles.Content:
well, i already had an account here. presenting my space station and working on a AAR-styl misison and then *sigh* ... the big "Jeb-stumbled-over-the-powerwire"-serverthingy.

so again. Hello my friends, fellows, spacefans and rocketscientists or even just spacetourist. here again Lazarus.

since my early days here on earth, i was facinated by space. watching old footage of the apollo missions on youtube i pure joy. i was so happy to find KSP, even words can't describe it ^^ so i'mworking on my own spaceprogramm, first station and satalitenetwork is complete and now my mÃƒÂ¼n-mission.

let's see if i can write a aar-style mÃƒÂ¼nmission

over and out, back in VAB, working on my rocket...
Welcome newcomer! I hope you enjoy this as much as I do! Have fun on the forums!
